ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Financial support for this study was granted by “Universidad Técnica Particular de Loja” through PROY_QUI_0010. The authors thank the Ministerio del Ambiente, Ecuador, for providing the plant collection and research permissions through “Autorización de Investigación Científica” “N° 001-IC-FLO-DBAP-VS-DRLZCH-MA”.
